data.name: Little Packaging Crew
data.detailed_description:
Pick and assign orders to your crew



Deliver packages to earn money



Thieves are coming, lock your workstations

Features:

  • Play with controller/keyboard this causal strategy/management, with action elements.
  • Play during your limited time, mission times vary between 5, 7 and 10 minutes each.
  • Enjoy the funny no-words language of your packaging crew.
  • Relax with the background music with 5 different tracks.
  • Play 15 missions in 5 different environments.
  • Reply missions to improve your stars score and unlock achievements.
data.about_the_game:
Pick and assign orders to your crew



Deliver packages to earn money



Thieves are coming, lock your workstations

Features:

  • Play with controller/keyboard this causal strategy/management, with action elements.
  • Play during your limited time, mission times vary between 5, 7 and 10 minutes each.
  • Enjoy the funny no-words language of your packaging crew.
  • Relax with the background music with 5 different tracks.
  • Play 15 missions in 5 different environments.
  • Reply missions to improve your stars score and unlock achievements.
data.short_description: A casual strategy with controller support. Work quickly with your crew to make enough money before thieves and giants attack. Buy locks and shields to protect your workstations. Give food and drinks to your crew to keep them healthy and happy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core @ 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 4 GB RAM (128 MB VRAM), e.g. Intel HD Graphics 520.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX capable sound card.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core @ 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 4 GB RAM (128 MB VRAM), e.g. Intel HD Graphics 620.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX capable sound card.
